titleStmt.title: Guzman, Hinde, and Hannam outstript being a discovery of the whole art, mistery and antiquity of theeves and theeving, with their statutes, laws, customs and practises, together with many new and unheard of cheats and trepannings.
Desordenada codicia de los bienes agenos. English
titleStmt.author: García, Carlos, doctor.

titleStmt.title: Guzman, Hinde, and Hannam outstript being a discovery of the whole art, mistery and antiquity of theeves and theeving, with their statutes, laws, customs and practises, together with many new and unheard of cheats and trepannings.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Desordenada codicia de los bienes agenos.
Attributed to Carlos Garcia. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
A reissue with new t.p. of: The sonne of the rogve. 1638.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
